Create your Rails Application

To get started with creating your first Rails 3 application, follow the directions in the screencast to create a simple blog with Rails 3.

If you want further resources for learning Ruby on Rails read the Resources for Getting Started with Ruby on Rails blog post.

Check out this Spanish translation of the Create your Rails Application tutorial, courtesy of Mario Alberto Chávez Cárdenas of Decisiones Inteligentes and Tiajuana.rb.
